Text:
Surji is the moniker of a vocalist of Peaches2Bitches, 
post-punk band from Moscow, Russia. 
His first solo release was EP 'Like in 1983' in 2011,
then LP 'Existentialism' followed in 2012.

Tracklist:

01. Trash Around The World
02. Holiday In The Woods
03. I've Made Experiments
04. 1983
05. Scream Of A Wean
06. Control
